bibl.title: The κῶμος of Pindar and Bacchylides and the Semantics of Celebration.
bibl.note: 1. Nominal forms. - 2. Verbal forms. - 3. Adjectives and appositives associated with κῶμος. - 4. Previous interpretations of κῶμος in epinician criticism. - 5. Conclusion.
